title: Protocols
sitename: Smithsonian National Museum of Natural History
cleaned_text: Search [Smithsonian National Museum of Natural History](/) ARMS Protocols Image: Sessile species colonizing an ARMS plate in Indonesia. © Chris Meyer Standardization of processing methods is the key point of ARMS research and allows for the comparability of marine biodiversity assessments. Step by step protocols are described for each part of the process, from ARMS assembly to the bioinformatics of ARMS molecular data. Click on each category below to get more information and download protocols or [download the access the overview
